name: mcp-sandbox-hub
postStartCommand: bash -c 'if [ -f /workspaces/mcp-sandbox-hub/tools/health_server.py ]; then pkill -f health_server.py 2>/dev/null || true; cd /workspaces/mcp-sandbox-hub && nohup python3 -u tools/health_server.py > /tmp/health.log 2>&1 & echo "Health server started (PID: $!)"; fi'
